item.title: VBA批量调整Excel单元格格式
item.description: 代码 该宏代码实现某一文件夹内全部Excel文件的单元格格式调整。 Sub 批量修改单元格格式() Dim wb As Excel.Workbook x = ThisWorkbook.Path & "\" f = Dir(x & "" & "*xls") Do While f <> "" If f <> ThisWorkbook.Name Then Set wb = Workbooks.Open(x & "" & f) For Each Sheet In Sheets Sheet.Columns("A:AZ").Font.Name = "微软雅黑" Sheet.Columns("A:AZ").Font.Size = "10" Sheet.Range("A:AZ").EntireColumn.AutoFit Next Sheet wb.Save wb.Close End If f = Dir Loop End Sub
